description.narrative: The aim of the CD project is to assist our client and their local E&S consultant in preparing the necessary E&S documentation on time and at adequate quality to the Lenders. The activities supported will include broadening the scope of the impact assessment and management planning carried out so far in accordance with international standards, as well as training and strengthening the E&S and technical capacity of the client and the local consultant engaged in this project so far.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands
